column1: The Pit Room////Why hasn't anyone told me about this place!?!? A small BBQ joint in Montrose and it's some of the best BBQ I've ever had
column3: who'd keep this spot a secret!? Honestly
column4: the best time to get here is right at opening
column5: and even then there are people waiting for those doors to swing open! It's understood once you get in
column8: and the atmosphere is perfect! Order it all! Haha but really
column9: I don't think anyone is ever disappointed here! Service is pretty quick even though there's always a line
column10: seats are plentiful and I love the outdoor seating area on the high stools! I think you can even sit next door at the watering hole (the name escapes me) Good authentic Texan BBQ... getchu some!!!!!
